roleset.name: certain
roleset.note: POSITIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ data. (from positive.01-j)

example.name: Both args
example.text: `` There 's a price above which I 'm positive Marshall has the courage not to pay , '' says A.D. Correll , Georgia - Pacific 's executive vice president for pulp and paper .
example.arg: Marshall has the courage not to pay

roleset.name: optimistic
roleset.note: POSITIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from positive.02-j)

role.descr: stimulus of optimism, generally good thing

example.name: both args
example.text: Second , we may guess from the words the thief left on the wall , " How poor your family is , work harder ! " that at least he is positive about life .

roleset.name: be confirmed for the presence of (like with a medical test)
roleset.note: POSITIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia for SHARP. Relation to negative.01. (from positive.03-j)

example.name: Blood type
example.text: -- Repeat INR , APTT and fibrinogen labs were within normal ranges , [Blood type]-1 was found *-1 to be B positive
